definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The Prince had shocked society by living openly with his mistress.
sentences.chinese: 皇子公開和他的情婦住在一起的舉動讓國民震驚。

sentences.english: So when this emperor's son comes in what stuff are they act?
sentences.chinese: 那麼本皇子進來時，他們正在做什麼事？

sentences.english: He was especially fond of India's medieval sculptures and the paintings of ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 皇子尤愛印度中世紀雕塑與中國古代繪畫。

sentences.english: Of course, she wins the love of the prince for her beauty and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 當然，她也以自己的美麗和智慧贏得了皇子的愛。

sentences.english: O- T dream that your Prince Charming will come and rescue you one day.
sentences.chinese: 你夢想有一天你的白馬皇子會來救你。

sentences.english: Song Wang Jien Queen told the chamberlain to Prince Defang called.
sentences.chinese: 宋皇后叫內侍王繼恩把皇子德芳叫來。

sentences.english: Riki was born middle child to the great dynasty of Tahlin.
sentences.chinese: 裏基是偉大的塔林王朝的二皇子。

definition: Ying Zheng (260-210 BC), personal name of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]
